CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Such dramatic enhancement in efficiency was attributed to a higher charge mobility and improved morphology of the PBTT : IEICO blend film induced by the less steric hindered linear alkyl side chain.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBTT |
| IEICO |
| PBTT : IEICO blend |

Explanation:

* PBTT: Poly(benzothiadiazole-co-thienothiophene)
* IEICO: Indacenodithiophene-co-benzothiadiazole-co-octithiophene
* PBTT : IEICO blend: A blend of PBTT and IEICO

These are the material names mentioned in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBTT : IEICO blend |

Explanation:

* PBTT : IEICO blend: A blend of PBTT and IEICO

The other two entities, PBTT and IEICO, are not explicitly mentioned as materials in the paragraph, but they are the building blocks of the blend material PBTT : IEICO. However, if we are strictly looking for material names that are clearly referred to in the paragraph, then only the blend material PBTT : IEICO qualifies.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Such dramatic enhancement in efficiency was attributed to a higher charge mobility and improved morphology of the PBTT : IEICO blend film induced by the less steric hindered linear alkyl side chain.

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| higher charge mobility |
| improved morphology |
| less steric hindered linear alkyl side chain |

Note that "less steric hindered" is considered one property name as it is used as an adjective to describe the linear alkyl side chain.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After reviewing the paragraph, I believe that all of the identified entities are related to material properties. Here is the updated table:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| higher charge mobility |
| improved morphology |
| less steric hindered linear alkyl side chain |

"Higher charge mobility" and "improved morphology" are properties of the PBTT : IEICO blend film. "Less steric hindered linear alkyl side chain" is a property of the chemical structure of the material that contributes to the observed enhancements in charge mobility and morphology.

Paragraph: Such dramatic enhancement in efficiency was attributed to a higher charge mobility and improved morphology of the PBTT : IEICO blend film induced by the less steric hindered linear alkyl side chain.

Let's think step by step.

```diff
| Property Value |
| --- |
| a higher charge mobility |
| improved morphology |
| the less steric hindered linear alkyl side chain |
```

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

```diff
| Property Value |
| --- |
| a higher charge mobility |
| improved morphology |
```
The other phrase, "the less steric hindered linear alkyl side chain", refers to a structural characteristic of the PBTT: IEICO blend film, not a value of a material property.
